While the full video of the event is still to come, you can find a knd reportage of the evening directly on the official [MilanoR blog](http://www.milanor.net/blog/9th-milanor-dataviz-presentations-photos/), and the full [deck of slides online](http://www.milanor.net/blog/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/paletter-Cirillo-1.pdf).
